dc_title_s: Map of the main Trenton Rock oil field of Indiana
dc_description_s: Shows good, fair, and light oil territory, gas wells, dry and salt water territory, undrilled area, and pumping stations. Detached from: 25th Annual report of the Department of Geology and Natural Resources of Indiana, 1900. 'January 1, 1901.' Scale 1:126,720. 2 miles = 1 in. By W.S. Blatchley, state geologist.
dc_publisher_s: Indiana Department of Geology and Natural Resources|William B. Burford
